messages.title: A fair deal for rural Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have a strong tradition of delivering for rural communities across Britain. Nick Clegg and Vince Cable’s party will bring real change to rural Britain. Our fairer tax plan will help families on middle and low incomes. Our economic plans will deliver more jobs. We will invest in our schools to give every child a fair start in life. We will clean up and change the broken Westminster politics once and for all.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: ACTION to help rural areas with sky high petrol prices
ACTION to provide more affordable homes for local families
ACTION to protect our countryside from greedy developers
ACTION to get more police on patrol to keep us safe
ACTION to protect frontline NHS services from more brutal cuts

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fair deal for farmers and fishermen
keyPolicies.policyDescription: ACTION to get a fair deal for farmers and fishermen from supermarkets

mentions.candidate: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable’s party
mentions.tacticalSituation: Don’t forget, in many areas, the choice is between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. In many parts of Britain, the choice is between the Conservatives and the Lib Dems.

images.caption: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable standing together in a rural setting.
Graphical contrast between Liberal Democrats and Conservatives highlighting the choice for voters.
